metadata.synopsis: * The idea: "I told you not another step forward, but another of yours sneaks in!"* Philomeen is playing this AD right before exploding the runepowder barrel, if another player approaches it while she is in her normal dialog (UND_PanicRoom_HiddenGnome).* This AD is supposed to be short but clear.
metadata.how_to_trigger: * Have at least 2 characters in your party.* goto -542; 27; 464, approach Philomeen with the 1 character* While that character is in the dialog, approach the runepowder barrel (next to her) with another character.* She will drop her dialog and will play this AD, then explode.

0.speaker: Philomeen
0.text: You drugnin' sneak. It is over!
